QueryResult.text: SELECT s.id id, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(a.practsum,0))/3600 FROM PRASSIGNMENT a, PRTASK t, SRM_RESOURCES r WHERE a.prtaskid = t.prid AND t.prprojectid = s.id AND a.prresourceid = r.id AND a.practsum is not null AND a.practsum > 0 AND r.resource_type = 0),0) actsum FROM INV_INVESTMENTS s
